CHANNEL_REQUIRED_TEXT: 🔒 Please join the announcement channel to access the bot, then press the button below.
ERROR_TRY_AGAIN: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
ERROR_RULES_RETRY: An error occurred. Please try accepting the rules again:
INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE:
❌ Insufficient balance.

Top up {amount} and try again.
REFERRAL_CODE_INVALID_HELP:
❌ Invalid referral code.

💡 If you have a referral code, please double-check the spelling.
⏭️ To continue without a referral code, use the /start command.
REFERRAL_CODE_QUESTION: 🤝 Do you have a friend's referral code? If you have a promo code or referral link, enter it now to receive a bonus! Send the code or tap "Skip":
ALREADY_REGISTERED_REFERRAL: ℹ️ You are already registered. A referral link cannot be applied.
RULES_TEXT_DEFAULT: 📋 Service Usage Rules 1. Do not use the service for illegal activity 2. Avoid sharing pirated or malicious content 3. Spam and phishing are prohibited 4. Using the service for DDoS attacks is forbidden 5. One account is intended for one person 6. Refunds are provided only in exceptional cases 7. The administration may block accounts that violate the rules By using the service you agree to follow these rules.
PROMOCODE_EMPTY_INPUT: ❌ Please enter a valid promo code
STARS_PAYMENT_ENROLLMENT_ERROR: ❌ Failed to credit funds. Please contact support; the payment will be verified manually.
STARS_PAYMENT_PROCESSING_ERROR: ❌ Technical error processing the payment. Please contact support for assistance.
STARS_PAYMENT_SUCCESS: 🎉 Payment processed successfully! ⭐ Stars spent: {stars_spent} 💰 Added to balance: {amount} ₽ 🆔 Transaction ID: {transaction_id}... Thank you for topping up! 🚀
STARS_PAYMENT_USER_NOT_FOUND: ❌ Error: user not found. Please contact support.
STARS_PRECHECK_INVALID_PAYLOAD: Payment validation error. Please try again.
STARS_PRECHECK_TECHNICAL_ERROR: Technical error. Please try again later.
STARS_PRECHECK_USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found. Please contact support.
UNKNOWN_COMMAND_MESSAGE: ❓ I didn't understand that command. Use the menu buttons.
WELCOME: 🎉 Welcome to VPN Service! Our service provides fast and secure internet access without restrictions. 🔐 Advantages: • High connection speed • Servers in different countries • Reliable data protection • 24/7 support To get started, select interface language:
ADMIN_PANEL: ⚙️ Administration panel Select a section to manage:
AUTOPAY_DISABLED_TEXT: Disabled — don't forget to renew manually!
AUTOPAY_ENABLED_TEXT: Enabled — the subscription will renew automatically
BUY_SUBSCRIPTION_START: 💎 Subscription setup Let's configure a plan that fits you. First, choose the subscription period:
CHANGE_DEVICES_INFO: 📱 Adjust device limit Current limit: {current_devices} devices Choose the new number of devices: 💡 Important: • Increasing — extra charge proportional to the remaining time • Decreasing — funds are not refunded
DEVICES_NO_CHANGE: ℹ️ Device limit was not changed
MAINTENANCE_MODE_ACTIVE:
🔧 Maintenance in progress!

The service is temporarily unavailable while we improve performance.

⏰ Estimated completion time: unknown
🔄 Please try again later

We apologize for the inconvenience.
MAINTENANCE_MODE_API_ERROR:
🔧 Maintenance in progress!

The service is temporarily unavailable due to connection issues with the servers.

⏰ We're working on it. Please try again in a few minutes.

🔄 Last check: {last_check}
PROMOCODE_USED: ℹ️ Promo code has already been used
REFERRAL_CODE_APPLIED: 🎁 Referral code applied! You will receive a bonus after the first purchase.
REFERRAL_INFO: 🤝 Referral program 👥 Invited: {referrals_count} friends 💰 Earned: {earned_amount} 🔗 Your referral link: {referral_link} 🎫 Your promo code: {referral_code} 💰 Terms: • Per friend: {registration_bonus} • Top-up commission: {commission_percent}%
RULES_REQUIRED: ❗️ You must accept the rules to use the service!
SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED: ❌ Subscription expired Your subscription has ended. Renew it to restore access.
SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRING: ⚠️ Subscription expiring! Your subscription expires in {days} days. Renew it now so you don't lose access.
SUPPORT_INFO: 🛠️ Technical support For any questions contact our support: 👤 {settings.SUPPORT_USERNAME} We can help with: • Connection setup • Troubleshooting issues • Payment questions • Other requests ⏰ Response time: usually within 1-2 hours
SWITCH_TRAFFIC_INFO: 🔄 Switch traffic limit Current limit: {current_traffic} Choose the new traffic amount: 💡 Important: • Increasing — you pay the difference proportionally to the remaining time • Decreasing — payments are not refunded • The used traffic counter is NOT reset
TRAFFIC_NO_CHANGE: ℹ️ Traffic limit was not changed
TRIAL_ALREADY_USED: ❌ The trial subscription has already been used
TRIAL_AVAILABLE: 🎁 Trial subscription You can get a free trial plan: ⏰ Duration: {days} days 📈 Traffic: {traffic} GB 📱 Devices: {devices} pcs 🌍 Server: {server_name} Activate the trial subscription?
TRIAL_ENDING_SOON: 🎁 The trial subscription is ending soon! Your trial expires in a few hours. 💎 Don't want to lose VPN access? Switch to the full subscription! 🔥 Special offer: • 30 days for {price} • Unlimited traffic • All servers available • Speeds up to 1 Gbit/s ⚡️ Activate before the trial ends!
